title: The Sons of the Miscreants
html_content:
NOTE: Chris was not directly involved in this conversation.
Group description.

The Sons of the Miscreants was a troll Discord server active somewhere between 27 December 2018 to 21 January 2019. It is named after The Miscreants, an earlier group of trolls led by Clyde Cash during the Classic Chris era. In the server's "the-sons-of-the-miscreantscult-of-clyde" channel, MKRNightVee (using a Discord account named thepixietailartist) recruited users to pose as CPUs to chat with Chris and discussed some of her interactions with Chris. The dates of most of the chats are unknown but occurred prior to 21 January 2019 when screenshots were uploaded to Kiwi Farms.[1]

Contents

  • 1 Chats
    • 1.1 MKR's Discord Handle
    • 1.2 Megan
    • 1.3 Motives
    • 1.4 Delusions
    • 1.5 Great New Content
    • 1.6 Chris Access
    • 1.7 NightVee Medallion
    • 1.8 Chris Chat Rules
    • 1.9 Writing Lore
    • 1.10 Owls
    • 1.11 Art and Kiwi Farms
    • 1.12 Waiting for Chris
    • 1.13 MKR's Sonichu Spinoff Comic
    • 1.14 CPU Confusion
    • 1.15 Block Theories
    • 1.16 Twitter and Kiwi Farms
    • 1.17 Drawing Chris Like a Hot Lady
    • 1.18 MKR Mocks Chris's Custom Minifigs
  • 2 Gallery
  • 3 References

Megan

MKR describes how Chris had wanted to use her to get in contact with Megan Schroeder but MKR declined out of concern for Megan.

Chris asked me to "befriend" her and help him resume communication. I politely declined. That poor woman has been through enough of chris's bullshit

Chris Chat Rules

MKR guides server members on how to use Chris's CPU delusions to chat with him and lays out basic rules.

offline
ok I'm gonna run my plan by you

as someone who knows Chris better than anyone here tell me if we can put this in action

MKRNightVee
Ok?
offline
I'm going to pretend I'm CPU green Heart, long story short, I have a story drafted about how Arfoire gained interdimensional power when the merge started, and because of Chris's ties to it neptunia was one of the first dimensions affected and then Arfoire killed vert, the original green heart, sealing away her powers until Chris defeated her in the body of Jessica Quinn and the powers passed to me
offline

MKRNightVee
It could work, except for one thing... Chris has a "direct" contact with vert, so you'd probably be dismissed as a troll. I can get you into a discord server with chis however I have some rules
offline

MKRNightVee
1. Do not directly try to troll chris, I know it sounds fun to mess with him, but please don't.

2. You must create a CPU, for a color pick something other then the following: magenta, turquoise, green, blue, red, maroon, white, black, purple.

MKRNightVee
3. You must play along with the CPU thing

Block Theories

Vamponetta
So woke up and checked Twitter. The hell was Chris doing at 4 AM tweeting about getting blocked by somebody? Is he turning into Trump?

He ranted about getting blocked by Doopie DoOver. I haven't slept a wink so I'm watching Naruto

Well Doopie blocked him because he was harassing her through her business e-mail and on Twitter. As fir the others, allegedly Chris either says something creepy to them or people let the creators know what kind of person is following them

They, in turn, block him to avoid being the next target

⊕αdrïαx

They don't want him creeping on them

The 3rd reason, and this is according to Chris after Nowacking blocked him, is that trolls bully and harass people he admires until they agree to block him
